item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[metaslider id=131]
Welcome to AA IT Tech With our 40,000 Sq. Ft warehouse we stock a wide array of HP, IBM, Dell, and other manufacturers products. We look forward to assisting you with any of your IT hardware, software or telecommunication needs. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if you have any questions.
  • HP SERVERSHP Servers, Workstations, Storage, Switches, Spare Parts.Shop HP Products
  • DELL SERVERSDELL Servers, Workstations, Storage, Switches, Spare Parts.Shop DELL Products
  • IBM SERVERSIBM Servers, Workstations, Storage, Switches, Spare Parts.Shop IBM Products
  • OTHER SERVERSAPPLE Servers, Workstations, Storage, Switches, Spare Parts.Shop OTHER Products

item.title: Storage
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The importance of having reliable and efficient storage equipment can’t be understated and that’s why we at AA IT Tech stock a variety of data storage products. Whether you are safeguarding small offices, branch offices or large data centers, AA IT Tech can help you protect and preserve the most important asset of your company, your data. Data is the backbone of your organization. No matter the industry or size, reliable data access is essential to your continued business operations. AA IT Tech Backup and Recovery Solutions deliver comprehensive data protection no matter the size of your business—from virtual-to-physical environments and short-to-long-term retention.

Our Backup, Recovery and Archive solutions deliver:

  • Accelerated backup for comprehensive data protection under aggressive SLAs
  • Fast recovery to improve your business resilience and uptime
  • Simplified administration and reduced management costs
  • Reliably secured data assets for long-term retention and compliance needs
  • Comprehensive governance solution for automated data lifecycle management

Are you facing these challenges?

  • Increased spending on primary storage with data growth
  • Uncontrolled retention resulting in unsustainable storage costs
  • Performance degradation plus service-level and availability issues
  • Disparate storage silos with increasing management complexity
  • Legacy and stale data resulting in CAPEX and OPEX overhead

AA IT Tech storage solutions can help:

  • Optimize storage usage, reduce cost and align data retention to suit business needs
  • Meet compliance and governance needs through automated data classification and defensible disposition
  • Harness the value of archive data to accelerate time-to-value of business insights and informed decisions
  • Future proof solutions to be scalable and modular to meet current and future needs
  • Drive down the economics of long-term retention with the best-of-breed disk, tape and archive software solutions
  • Reduce risk and business downtime with industry-leading performance
  • Centralize remote office data protection for simplified administration
  • Balance performance, cost and retention period needs to meet compliance needs
  • Lower capital and operational expenditure
Not only can we offer you a huge selection of different top brands from HP to Dell, you can find everything from Hard Disk Drives to Tape Drives and a vast array of Solid State Drives. Our products come in an assortment of different capacities and great value prices to meet all of your needs. If you have any questions or need any advice about any of the items listed above, please don’t hesitate to contact us at AA IT Tech and we will be happy to provide you with the guidance about which equipment will best suit your exact needs.

item.title: Networking
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Today’s modern applications call for new thinking about network architecture. AA IT Tech Networking solutions free you from outdated, proprietary approaches. Instead, you evolve your network on your timeline. You take control of your network’s future, and in doing so improve infrastructure, gain performance and lower costs - all while remaining flexible to adopt new innovations. When it comes to your network you need to have something that is reliable, efficient and well protected, particularly in business. At AA IT Tech we understand just how important this is and that’s why we have a comprehensive stock of networking equipment. Get cutting-edge technology and industry-leading functionality with AA IT Tech. The ability to share software and maintain consistent features while allowing for reusable code, components, and more helps your business, your network, and your teams automate tasks faster and create new services or applications easier than before. Secure, reliable and seamless, AA IT Tech switches scale to meet the needs of networks of all sizes. There are several options available to you in regards to how we can set up or upgrade your current network. We can help you modernize your network infrastructure by transforming it from a closed, proprietary architecture to an open, standards-based platform that lets you chart your own course. You’ll benefit from:
  • Modular platforms that are interoperable, open-standards-based, and software defined networking (SDN)-ready
  • Flatter, faster, more easily managed fabrics
  • User-centric, secure, application-aware wireless solutions
We give you flexibility and a different way of doing business that can transform your network, redefine your IT economics and accelerate your results. Our networking solutions help you:
  • Connect, consolidate and converge in-rack server and storage elements with high-performance, 10/40GbE switching technologies
  • Accelerate east-west traffic to meet the needs of today’s server-to-server communication
  • Virtualize while lowering cost structures — with low latency, automated data center fabrics
  • Connect end users and end points with both wireless and wired solutions that we’ve optimized for the mobility and multimedia needs of a secure, BYOD strategy
We offer an enormous choice of big name and third party brands to offer you a range of the best pricing available. Also, with our networking equipment you can find everything you need to set up or improve your network. From cards and adapters, to routers, there will be something for you. If you have questions or need any advice about any networking subjects listed below, please don’t hesitate to contact us at AA IT Tech and we will be happy to provide you with the guidance about which will work best for exactly what you are trying to accomplish. - Switches - Network switch modules - Network security - Network antennas - Network cards and adapters - Network transceiver modules - Firewalls (hardware) - Gateways/controllers - Routers - Network management - Network chassis - Wireless networking - Range extenders - Powerline networking

item.title: Parts & Accessories
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Do you already have a server system, storage or networking equipment that needs a part or an upgrade? Along with our fantastic range of servers here at AA IT Tech we also stock an excellent choice of parts and accessories to go with them. You can find everything from racks and mounting kits to replacement power supplies and cabling. Much like our servers you can also find a variety of different makes like Dell, HP, IBM, Sun, Samsung, as well as many more. We stock all the parts you are looking for and can deliver straight to you in a timely fashion, usually getting all ordered parts shipped out of our warehouse within 24 hours of order placement. If you need expedited shipping, no problem, just tell one of our professional sales reps and they will be sure that your order arrives in the exact time needed, no need to stress! If you have any questions or need any advice about any parts or accessories listed below, please don’t hesitate to contact us at AA IT Tech and we will be happy to provide you with the guidance about which work best with which servers.
- CPU’s - Memory - Hard drives - Video cards - System boards - Power Supplies - Fans, coolers and radiators - Mounting kits - Cabling - Slot expanders - Racks - Rack consoles - Interface components

item.title: Software
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We stock a fantastic choice of enterprise and personal software packages at AA IT Tech. This includes software for Operating Systems, Storage and Networking, from a variety of different top brands. AA IT Tech saves you money on leading brand software. We work hard for our customers to deliver the best prices and the best service on a broad range of software solutions, from network security for your business to personal home systems. We are one of the only online software outlets that guarantees our software is original manufacturer software with legal manufacturer licensing. AA IT Tech uses a triple check procedure to ensure everything that we receive, stock and sell is 100% genuine. You can find licensed packages from established names like Microsoft, Cisco, and HP for great value prices and deals. Having new and up-to-date software is a must for any server system, especially in business, so browse our stock today and select a software package to suit you. If you need any advice with any software listed below, please contact us at AA IT Tech and we will be happy to provide you with the guidance you need.
  • Operating systems
  • Server systems software
  • Storage software
  • Networking software

item.title: Sell to Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Do you have a used server, server parts, telephone systems, networking/storage equipment or any other used IT hardware lying around that you need to get rid of? Are you someone who works within the industry that gets recycled systems or parts? We don’t just provide quality IT systems and equipment to our customers, we are also happy to purchase new and used servers and parts, as well as a range of networking and storage equipment. We aim to offer our customers and sellers the complete service, offering accurate and honest advice regarding networking and server solutions, as well as helping you to understand the potential value of the excess or redundant equipment that you may wish to sell. Sell your IT hardware to a company that will make the process an enjoyable one. We can also expertly refurbish your old equipment, and because we’re a green conscious company we also offer absolutely free IT recycling for everything that we cannot use. In addition to complete servers, we will also buy the associated spare parts such as CPU’s, memory, hard drives, video cards, NIC’s, HBA’s and more. Our expert customer service team we will be more than happy to provide you with an offer for surplus equipment and hardware.

Get In Touch

So what are you waiting for? Simply fill out the contact form below, including the details of any equipment you wish to sell to us and one of our customer service experts will be in touch shortly regarding a quote for your equipment.

We would love to take your old equipment off your hands! Just fill out the form below to get started! [contact-form-7 id="231" title="Contact form 1"]

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
AA IT Tech is one of the leading independent stockholders of new and refurbished computer and data center equipment. We specialize in servers, storage and networking equipment from leading industry manufacturers such as Dell, HP, IBM, Apple, Cisco, Sun Microsystems, Intel and many more well-known brands, as well as cost effective 3rd party brands. We hold a huge inventory of stock items that enables us to serve thousands of happy customers all over the globe - including many large & small corporate clients, public sector organizations, resellers and distributors. Over the years, we have built a team who understands your need for reliable products, prompt delivery and perfect customer service. We are dedicated to providing our customers with outstanding customer service and high quality new and refurbished products. We have the very best prices in the business because we not only distribute our products, but we also do all of the refurbishing ourselves, making sure our customers get exactly what they want and need. AA IT Tech can provide all your hardware or software needs such as custom configured servers, storage, networking equipment, or any computer related parts. All of our products are meticulously tested before we make them available to you, and we back that with a 30 day warranty. When you purchase through us, you can expect quality products, expert packaging, and incredibly speedy shipping! We are extremely excited to have the very best sales experts around. Some of our incredible sales representatives have been in the industry since 1990, and our customers benefit from that experience every day. So whether you have a question about a specific refurbished part such as a Sun Server or a Dell Server, or you are looking for the very best deals and IT hardware for your company, our experts are capable and always happy to help! Save money and shop with a company that you can feel good about. We not only help the environment by refurbishing used equipment, but we always recycle the obsolete equipment that we cannot make use of. So the next time you are looking for something specific like a refurbished Blade server, IBM storage enclosure parts, or you are just looking for a great deal on refurbished IT hardware in general, shop with us!

Our main goal is to make your experience an easy and enjoyable one at AA IT Tech!

Ease-

We love what we do and want our customers to enjoy working with us too. We aim to make working with AA IT Tech as effortless as possible. Our dedicated account managers will work closely with you on every deal in order to make sure that this happens.

Value-

We offer the highest quality products at industry-leading prices. We have a huge inventory of stock ourselves - plus links to hundreds of established suppliers across the globe enabling us to deliver the best products, at the best prices, in the most timely manner possible, throughout the US and internationally.

Service-

Customer service is our #1 priority at all times. All of our staff members take personal responsibility for their part in delivering our customers the best service in the industry, guaranteed. We will stop at nothing to give our valued clients the respect and professionalism they deserve.

Quality-

We only offer the highest quality products available to meet your needs. Every item that is received into our distribution center is inspected and tested for correct functioning upon arrival and stored safely & securely. We dispatch our products in specifically manufactured packaging materials to ensure safe delivery to our customers.

item.title: Apple
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
AA IT Tech is dedicated to providing you with the best choice when it comes to servers. As well as the extensive collection of Dell, HP and IBM servers, we also stock a huge choice of other servers from a variety of different brands. You can find leading brands such as Cisco, Apple, Sun Microsystems, as well as other names like Quantum, Supermicro, Fujitsu and others. There are a wealth of capacities and specifications in our new, used and refurbished models to accommodate your needs.
Finding a computer that suits your business' needs without breaking your technology budget can be challenging, but we are able to supply you with everything you need without charging an arm and a leg for it. Whether your business is in need of a high end server or a basic entry-level refurbished server then the team at AA IT Tech can help. We offer incredible deals and a variety of manufacturers that offer the following products:
- Servers
- Server Parts
- Workstations
- Workstation Parts
- Hard Drives
- Storage
- Networking
If you require a lot of power and memory you may be interested in our range of rack servers that can be custom-built to accommodate what you need. Alternatively, you may be interested in a smaller, new or used server that can comfortably deal with your demands. If your business has limited space then look into our storage and rack servers that provide a slim, space-saving design. We offer towers, rackmount units, blades, and anything else currently available in the market.
If your budget requires you to take the refurbished or used equipment route, don’t worry, AA IT Tech offers one of the industry's widest varieties of refurbished and used equipment. Refurbished servers can be ideal for creating a reliable data center that will run smoothly and efficiently without error or causing delays. Our effective refurbishing process creates an innovative solution for energy savings and management features combined with high quality server parts that you can rely on. Our prices are unmatched and we are confident that you will be unable to find a larger selection of servers at better prices.
At AA IT Tech we are passionate about serving our customers with the highest quality equipment as well as ensuring that they are completely satisfied with their purchase and buying experience. We choose products from the most trusted vendors and put all of our refurbished server parts or workstations through rigorous testing to ensure that they are performing at the top of their game before we sell them to our customers. All of our used and refurbished servers, parts or accessories are backed with a 30 day warranty so that you can rest assured that your equipment is high quality and reliable.
Don't risk your businesses' security, productivity, or budget on IT equipment that you can't trust. Contact AA IT Tech today and let us help you find the perfect solution for all your needs! Running a business is difficult, but let us make your job easier with our high quality servers, storage, networking and server parts. We are excited to work with you to find the perfect system that suits your IT budget. AA IT Tech operates with a 40,000 sqft. warehouse that is filled with all the technology you need to run your business efficiently. Our products are affordable and reliable and our specialists are standing by to answer any questions you have. If you need some guidance regarding which server is the right choice for you, feel free to contact our team of experts who will be happy to assist you. Contact us today!

item.title: Dell
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: AA IT Tech is proud to offer new, used and refurbished Dell Servers at the best available pricing in the market. Whatever you are looking to use your Dell servers for, you can find something to suit your exact needs. Dell is an established brand, long-associated with creating top quality computers and products, and their fantastic varieties of servers and related equipment are no exception. Dell servers are recognized for their flexibility, guaranteed hardware, and the wide range of services they can offer to businesses of all sizes and types. Because of their reliability, Dell tower servers are one of the most popular choices for small and large businesses alike. We understand what it takes to run a business and we are dedicated to maintaining the standard of complete customer satisfaction with every server we sell. We stand behind every product we sell - whether it be a complete refurbished Dell server or a few basic Dell server parts. Our prices are designed to be fair and affordable, but we never sacrifice quality to keep our prices low. For several years we have been providing businesses with incredible service combined with high quality parts that will last.Whatever the Dell product you may need, AA IT Tech has you covered! Finding a computer that suits your business' needs without breaking your technology budget can be challenging, but we are able to supply you with everything you need without charging an arm and a leg for it. Whether your business is in need of a high end Poweredge server or a basic entry-level refurbished dell server then the team at AA IT Tech can help. We offer incredible deals and a variety of Dell products including: - Dell Servers - Dell Server Parts - Dell Workstations - Dell Workstation Parts - Dell Hard Drives - Dell Storage - Dell Networking If you require a lot of power and memory you may be interested in our range of Dell rack servers that can be custom-built to accommodate what you need. Alternatively, you may be interested in a smaller, new or used server that can comfortably deal with your demands. If your business has limited space then look into our Dell storage and rack servers for a slim, space-saving design. We offer towers, rackmount units, blades, and anything else Dell has available. If your budget requires you to take the refurbished or used equipment route, don’t worry, AA IT Tech offers one of the industry's widest varieties of refurbished and used Dell equipment. Refurbished Dell servers can be ideal for creating a reliable data center that will run smoothly and efficiently without error or causing delays. Our effective refurbishing process creates an innovative solution for energy savings and management features combined with high quality Dell server parts that you can rely on. Our prices are unmatched and we are confident that you will be unable to find a larger selection of Dell servers at better prices. At AA IT Tech we are passionate about serving our customers with the highest quality equipment as well as ensuring that they are completely satisfied with their purchase and buying experience. We choose products from the most trusted vendors and put all of our refurbished Dell server parts or workstations through rigorous testing to ensure that they are performing at the top of their game before we sell them to our customers. All of our used and refurbished Dell servers, parts or accessories are backed with a 30 day warranty so that you can rest assured that your equipment is high quality and reliable. Don't risk your businesses' security, productivity, or budget on IT equipment that you can't trust. Contact AA IT Tech today and let us help you find the perfect solution for all your needs! Running a business is difficult, but let us make your job easier with our high quality Dell servers, storage, networking and server parts. We are excited to work with you to find the perfect system that suits your IT budget. AA IT Tech operates with a 40,000 sqft. warehouse that is filled with all the technology you need to run your business efficiently. Our Dell products are affordable and reliable and our specialists are standing by to answer any questions you have. If you need some guidance regarding which Dell server is the right choice for you, feel free to contact our team of experts who will be happy to assist you. Contact us today!
